title: Barrilito released
content:
Hello friends!  
Cocijotype is proud to announce its first font release, Barrilito, a heavy funny typeface based in wood and linoleum engraving. It has a lot of ligatures to make typesetting for titles more interesting. Available at [MyFonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015131617/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/cocijotype/barrilito/)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015131617im_/http:/typophile.com/files/barrilito_6138.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [barrilito.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015131617/http:/typophile.com/files/barrilito.jpg) | 262.22 KB |
author: Eli

comments.content: Good to know you are active, Elí. And the font is very nice indeed. Congratulations.
Thanks Cristobal, I'm really satisfied with this work. Cheers!
Congrats on you first release, Elí. It's looking \*very\* nice. I can imagine you're being satified with it.
Is not the first good work of Eli, it is the second! The first one [Barricada](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015131617/http:/sudtipos.com/fonts/106) was published by Sudtipos. Congrats Eli!

Relaxed and inviting, well done, Elí!

ChrisL

@ Jos. That's right, I'm very satisfied with this effort.  
@ Ale. Thanks, I have learnt so much of you. This is only the beggining!  
@ Dezcom. Thanks Chris.  
@ William. Thank you very much.
